title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 3.3 - Exceptions by civil service commission
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 3.3 - Exceptions by civil service commission

State Regulations

Whenever the Civil Service Commission takes exception to the
name of the person appearing on a payroll, submitted for certification, the
salary of such person will not be included in the payment of the payroll. However, the name of the person so eliminated may be resubmitted for
certification. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
3.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
